panels.description: Percentage of statements that are prepared vs unprepared.
panels.title: Prepared Statements Ratio

targets.expr: topk(5, sum by (table) (irate(cassandra_table_readlatency_seconds_count{ keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$instance"}[3m])))
topk(5, max by (table) (cassandra_table_readlatency_seconds{keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$instance", quantile="0.95"}))
topk(5, max by (table) (cassandra_table_readlatency_seconds{keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$instance", quantile="0.99"}))
topk(5, max by (table) (cassandra_table_writelatency_seconds{keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$instance", quantile="0.99"}))

topk(10, cassandra_table_compactionbyteswritten_count{keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$instance"} - cassandra_table_compactionbyteswritten_count{keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$instance"} offset 1m)

topk(10, (cassandra_table_droppedmutations_count{keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$instance"} - cassandra_table_droppedmutations_count{keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$instance"} offset 1m))
